contributions: Discovered inefficiency in high-frequency metric rendering procedure in Pytorch Lightning's Rich Progress Bar
Improved runtime efficiency by replacing in-loop string concatenations with generator expression
Benchmarked and visualized performance gains using timeit
Enabled user-defined delimiter for machine learning metrics displayed in PyTorch Lightning's Rich Progress Bar, enhancing flexibility and readability of metrics display
Introduced configurable formatting type for metric values in PyTorch Lightning's Rich Progress Bar, enabling informative display of loss values in atypical ranges
Improved stability of metrics rendering display by standardizing a formatting type with consistent decimal precision
Implemented unit tests to verify the behavior and configuration of custom metric formatting
Introduced configurable external cursor shape, enabling users to specify cursor shape during scripts executions
